name: S3ReplicationConfigurationRules
description: Rules is a property of the Amazon S3 ReplicationConfiguration property that specifies which Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) objects to replicate and where to store them.

properties.name: Destination
properties.description: Defines the destination where Amazon S3 stores replicated objects.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique identifier for the rule. If you don't specify a value, AWS CloudFormation generates a random ID.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: An object prefix. This rule applies to all Amazon S3 objects with this prefix. To specify all objects in an S3 bucket, specify an empty string.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Whether the rule is enabled. For valid values, see the Status element of the PUT Bucket replication action in the Amazon Simple Storage Service API Reference.
